# addArrangedSubview(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified view to the end of the arranged subviews list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addArrangedSubview(_ view: NSView)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: The view to add to the end of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStackView/arrangedSubviews] array.

## Discussion

The stack view ensures that the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStackView/arrangedSubviews] array is always a subset of its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] array. This method automatically adds the provided view as a subview of the stack view, if it is not already. If the view is already a subview, this operation does not alter the subview ordering.

## Managing the Arranged Subviews

- **insertArrangedSubview(_:at:)**: Adds the provided view to the array of arranged subviews at the specified index.
- **removeArrangedSubview(_:)**: Removes the provided view from the stack’s array of arranged subviews.
- **arrangedSubviews**: The array of views arranged by the stack view.
